column4: my cursor is really jumpy... has anyone else experienced this?  how would i fix it?
that's usually caused by using the wrong mouse driver in xorg.conf
how would i find out what driver to use?
can you paste the mouse config from your xorg.conf?
or just paste the entire xorg.conf
yep... it will take me a second.
it's a complex configuration.  I wonder if the wacom stuff is stepping on the touchpad stuff.
first thing I'd try is changing the protocol.  I'll have to look up what you can change it to.  google for xorg and synaptics and protocol, and see what appears.
i have a previous xorg saved where my mouse was working fine i will try comparing the two line for line.
and i'll google that stuff right now!
